SELECT a.first_name as userFirstName, b.street as startStreet, b.zone as startZone, d.street as deliveryStreet, d.zone as deliveryZone, e.date_delivery as dateDelivery, a.phone as userPhone, e.travel_status as travelStatus FROM person a, address b, address d, travel e, user f, driver g WHERE g.driver_id = #{driverId} and e.user_id=f.user_id and g.driver_id=e.driver_id and f.person_id=a.person_id and e.start_address_id=b.address_id and e.delivery_address_id=d.address_id and e.status = 1

SELECT a.first_name as firstName, a.first_surname as firstSurname, a.second_surname as secondSurname, d.name as companyName, a.ci as ci FROM person a, driver b, company d WHERE b.person_id=a.person_id and d.company_id=b.company_id and b.status = 1
